entry.title: Posted by: Florian
entry.content: @Wexlei Silveira: Have you seen that Instantbird 0.3 alpha 1 has twitter support by default? Could you please tell us more about what’s worrying you exactly? And maybe about what’s different in the way Trillian handles twitter?

entry.title: Posted by: Wexlei Silveira
entry.content:
Use protocols as extension was a great idea, for sure.
But I’m realy worried about how to implement Twitter. I think that maybe better to implement it as in Trillian.
No Doubt that the format of the implementation of Twitter in Trillian is the best.

entry.title: Posted by: Florian
entry.content: @patrickjdempsey: This seems to be a Pidgin plugin, not a libpurple protocol plugin, and it uses XMPP (the page explains how an account can be created using the XMPP protocol plugin). However, I agree that we need to write some documentation for this feature.
